Organization_Assignment_Restrictions_Dat.description: Default to FALSE, if omitted.If set to TRUE, all existing Allowed/Default Organization(s) will be removed before any further processes.If inheritance of default and allowed values from the superior is being severed, setting this to 'TRUE' will not persist inherited values for any org type.

Supervisory_OrganizationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Supervisory_OrganizationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Supervisory_OrganizationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Organization_Assignment_Restrictions_Dat.description: Supervisory Organization Reference holds the Superviosry Organization for which the allowed/default organization(s) will be changed.

Organization_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Organization_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Organization_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Organization_Assignment_Restrictions_by_.description: Organization Type Reference. Can not be duplicated within 1 request.

Staff_Allowed_Data.description: Boolean to indicate if existing default value is to be deleted. The existing default value must be correctly specified. Do not set to true (or 'y' in EIB) to replace the existing default value.

StaffObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StaffObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StaffObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Staff_Default_Data.description: When set to TRUE, the values in Default_Organization_Reference will be removed from existing Default Organization;when omitted or set to FALSE, the values in Default_Organization_Reference will be merged into existing Default Organization. If inheritance of default and allowed values from the superior is being severed, setting this to 'TRUE' will not persist inherited values for this org type.

Organization_Assignment_Restrictions_Dat.description: Organization Assignment Restrictions Data for an Organization Type

validation.validation: Organization Assignment Restrictions or Defaults cannot be specified for this organization type ([org type]).
validation.description: Organization Assignment Restrictions or Defaults cannot be specified for this organization type.

validation.validation: Because allowed organization is defined for the organization type, default organization must be one of the allowed organizations.
Select only 1 default organization when the Position Assignment Unique report field is true.
An Organization Type only allows 1 Default Organization Assignment.
validation.description: An Organization Type only allows 1 Default Organization Assignment.

validation.validation: Organization Types in request can not duplicate.
validation.description: Organization Types in request can not duplicate.

validation.validation: Default Cost Center [cost_center] has 'Restricted To Companies' and the default value for Company  [company] must be one of them. If Company has allowed values, then they must include one of the 'Restricted To Companies' as the default value for Company must also be an allowed value.
validation.description: Default Company must be one of the 'Restricted To Companies' for default Cost Center.
